questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's journey to a prison mine where he encounters a key character from his past. What is...?
Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
